title: Corruption Unveiled
story: In a small town nestled deep in the Appalachian Mountains,
the locals are oblivious to the dark shadows that lurk beneath their picturesque facade.

suspect.name: Evelyn Sinclair
suspect.alibi: As an executive at Texcorps, Evelyn claims to be working late on the night of the incident.
suspect.confirmation: Security footage confirms her presence at the office during the crucial hours.

witness.name: Oliver Thompson
witness.observation: Oliver, a local journalist, stumbled upon some files on Texcorps's illegal activities.
witness.description: He is distraught and fearful, realizing the danger he is now exposed to.

npcs.name: Ingrid McGregor
npcs.dialogue: Ingrid runs a local café known for being a social hub. She has seen many interesting things happening around town.

npcs.name: Nathan Bennett
npcs.dialogue: Nathan, the town mayor, has always been suspicious of Texcorps' activities, but never had hard evidence.

clues.front door: A maintenance report goes missing from the town hall, records say the report implicated Texcorps.
clues.back door: An anonymous tipster leaves a letter stating that Texcorps is dumping toxic waste in a nearby pond.
clues.basement: Financial records show an unusual spike in Texcorps profits after they allegedly released a faulty product.
clues.study: A hidden compartment inside Oliver's desk contains evidence of a secret Texcorps meeting.
